itemDescription: Professor of Tropical Medicine at the University of Oxford

wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas John White  (born 13 March 1951) is a British medical doctor and researcher, specializing in tropical medicine in developing countries. He is known for his work on tropical diseases, especially malaria using artemisinin-based combination therapy.

response: *Professor Nicholas John White  Chairman, Wellcome Trust, South East Asia Research Units; Professor of Tropical Medicine, Oxford, UK/Mahidol University, Thailand. For services to tropical medicine and global health.
